019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.google.inject.Inject;
022import com.plotsquared.core.PlotSquared;
023import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.Settings;
024import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
025import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlotMergeEvent;
026import com.plotsquared.core.events.Result;
027import com.plotsquared.core.location.Direction;
028import com.plotsquared.core.location.Location;
029import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
030import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
031import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
032import com.plotsquared.core.plot.PlotArea;
033import com.plotsquared.core.util.EconHandler;
034import com.plotsquared.core.util.EventDispatcher;
035import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
036import com.plotsquared.core.util.PlotExpression;
037import com.plotsquared.core.util.StringMan;
038import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
039import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
040import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
041import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
042
043import java.util.UUID;
044
045@CommandDeclaration(command = "merge",
046        aliases = "m",
047        permission = "plots.merge",
048        usage = "/plot merge <all | n | e | s | w> [removeroads]",
049        category = CommandCategory.SETTINGS,
050        requiredType = RequiredType.NONE,
051        confirmation = true)
052public class Merge extends SubCommand {
053
054    public static final String[] values = new String[]{"north", "east", "south", "west"};
055    public static final String[] aliases = new String[]{"n", "e", "s", "w"};
056
057    private final EventDispatcher eventDispatcher;
058    private final EconHandler econHandler;
059
060    @Inject
061    public Merge(
062            final @NonNull EventDispatcher eventDispatcher,
063            final @NonNull EconHandler econHandler
064    ) {
065        this.eventDispatcher = eventDispatcher;
066        this.econHandler = econHandler;
067    }
068
069    public static String direction(float yaw) {
070        yaw = yaw / 90;
071        int i = Math.round(yaw);
072        return switch (i) {
073            case -4, 0, 4 -> "SOUTH";
074            case -1, 3 -> "EAST";
075            case -2, 2 -> "NORTH";
076            case -3, 1 -> "WEST";
077            default -> "";
078        };
079    }
080
081    @Override
082    public boolean onCommand(final PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args) {
083        Location location = player.getLocationFull();
084        final Plot plot = location.getPlotAbs();
085        if (plot == null) {
086            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot"));
087            return false;
088        }
089        if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
090            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("info.plot_unowned"));
091            return false;
092        }
093        if (plot.getVolume() > Integer.MAX_VALUE) {
094            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("schematics.schematic_too_large"));
095            return false;
096        }
097        Direction direction = null;
098        if (args.length == 0) {
099            switch (direction(player.getLocationFull().getYaw())) {
100                case "NORTH" -> direction = Direction.NORTH;
101                case "EAST" -> direction = Direction.EAST;
102                case "SOUTH" -> direction = Direction.SOUTH;
103                case "WEST" -> direction = Direction.WEST;
104            }
105        } else {
106            for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
107                if (args[0].equalsIgnoreCase(values[i]) || args[0].equalsIgnoreCase(aliases[i])) {
108                    direction = Direction.getFromIndex(i);
109                    break;
110                }
111            }
112            if (direction == null && (args[0].equalsIgnoreCase("all") || args[0]
113                    .equalsIgnoreCase("auto"))) {
114                direction = Direction.ALL;
115            }
116        }
117        if (direction == null) {
118            player.sendMessage(
119                    TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
120                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(
121                            "/plot merge <" + StringMan.join(values, " | ") + "> [removeroads]"
122                    )))
123            );
124            player.sendMessage(
125                    TranslatableCaption.of("help.direction"),
126                    TagResolver.resolver("dir", Tag.inserting(Component.text(direction(location.getYaw()))))
127            );
128            return false;
129        }
130        final int size = plot.getConnectedPlots().size();
131        int max = Permissions.hasPermissionRange(player, "plots.merge", Settings.Limit.MAX_PLOTS);
132        PlotMergeEvent event =
133                this.eventDispatcher.callMerge(plot, direction, max, player);
134        if (event.getEventResult() == Result.DENY) {
135            player.sendMessage(
136                    TranslatableCaption.of("events.event_denied"),
137                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("Merge")))
138            );
139            return false;
140        }
141        boolean force = event.getEventResult() == Result.FORCE;
142        direction = event.getDir();
143        final int maxSize = event.getMax();
144
145        if (!force && size - 1 > maxSize) {
146            player.sendMessage(
147                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
148                    TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Component.text(Permission.PERMISSION_MERGE + "." + (size + 1))))
149            );
150            return false;
151        }
152        final PlotArea plotArea = plot.getArea();
153        PlotExpression priceExr = plotArea.getPrices().getOrDefault("merge", null);
154        final double price = priceExr == null ? 0d : priceExr.evaluate(size);
155
156        UUID uuid = player.getUUID();
157
158        if (!force && !plot.isOwner(uuid)) {
159            if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_COMMAND_MERGE)) {
160                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_plot_perms"));
161                return false;
162            } else {
163                uuid = plot.getOwnerAbs();
164            }
165        }
166        if (direction == Direction.ALL) {
167            boolean terrain = true;
168            if (args.length == 2) {
169                terrain = "true".equalsIgnoreCase(args[1]);
170            }
171            if (!force && !terrain && !Permissions
172                    .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_MERGE_KEEP_ROAD)) {
173                player.sendMessage(
174                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
175                        TagResolver.resolver(
176                                "node",
177                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_MERGE_KEEP_ROAD)
178                        )
179                );
180                return true;
181            }
182            if (plot.getPlotModificationManager().autoMerge(Direction.ALL, maxSize, uuid, player, terrain)) {
183                if (this.econHandler.isEnabled(plotArea) && price > 0d) {
184                    this.econHandler.withdrawMoney(player, price);
185                    player.sendMessage(
186                            TranslatableCaption.of("economy.removed_balance"),
187                            TagResolver.resolver("money", Tag.inserting(Component.text(this.econHandler.format(price)))),
188                            TagResolver.resolver(
189                                    "balance",
190                                    Tag.inserting(Component.text(this.econHandler.format(this.econHandler.getMoney(player))))
191                            )
192                    );
193                }
194                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("merge.success_merge"));
195                eventDispatcher.callPostMerge(player, plot);
196                return true;
197            }
198            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("merge.no_available_automerge"));
199            return false;
200        }
201        if (!force && this.econHandler.isEnabled(plotArea) && price > 0d
202                && this.econHandler.getMoney(player) < price) {
203            player.sendMessage(
204                    TranslatableCaption.of("economy.cannot_afford_merge"),
205                    TagResolver.resolver("money", Tag.inserting(Component.text(this.econHandler.format(price))))
206            );
207            return false;
208        }
209        final boolean terrain;
210        if (args.length == 2) {
211            terrain = "true".equalsIgnoreCase(args[1]);
212        } else {
213            terrain = true;
214        }
215        if (!force && !terrain && !Permissions
216                .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_MERGE_KEEP_ROAD)) {
217            player.sendMessage(
218                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
219                    TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_MERGE_KEEP_ROAD))
220            );
221            return true;
222        }
223        if (plot.getPlotModificationManager().autoMerge(direction, maxSize - size, uuid, player, terrain)) {
224            if (this.econHandler.isEnabled(plotArea) && price > 0d) {
225                this.econHandler.withdrawMoney(player, price);
226                player.sendMessage(
227                        TranslatableCaption.of("economy.removed_balance"),
228                        TagResolver.resolver("money", Tag.inserting(Component.text(this.econHandler.format(price))))
229                );
230            }
231            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("merge.success_merge"));
232            eventDispatcher.callPostMerge(player, plot);
233            return true;
234        }
235        Plot adjacent = plot.getRelative(direction);
236        if (adjacent == null || !adjacent.hasOwner() || adjacent
237                .isMerged((direction.getIndex() + 2) % 4) || (!force && adjacent.isOwner(uuid))) {
238            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("merge.no_available_automerge"));
239            return false;
240        }
241        if (!force && !Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_MERGE_OTHER)) {
242            player.sendMessage(
243                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
244                    TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_MERGE_OTHER))
245            );
246            return false;
247        }
248        java.util.Set<UUID> uuids = adjacent.getOwners();
249        boolean isOnline = false;
250        for (final UUID owner : uuids) {
251            final PlotPlayer<?> accepter = PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayerIfExists(owner);
252            if (!force && accepter == null) {
253                continue;
254            }
255            isOnline = true;
256            final Direction dir = direction;
257            Runnable run = () -> {
258                accepter.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("merge.merge_accepted"));
259                plot.getPlotModificationManager().autoMerge(dir, maxSize - size, owner, player, terrain);
260                PlotPlayer<?> plotPlayer = PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayerIfExists(player.getUUID());
261                if (plotPlayer == null) {
262                    accepter.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("merge.merge_not_valid"));
263                    return;
264                }
265                if (this.econHandler.isEnabled(plotArea) && price > 0d) {
266                    if (!force && this.econHandler.getMoney(player) < price) {
267                        player.sendMessage(
268                                TranslatableCaption.of("economy.cannot_afford_merge"),
269                                TagResolver.resolver("money", Tag.inserting(Component.text(this.econHandler.format(price))))
270                        );
271                        return;
272                    }
273                    this.econHandler.withdrawMoney(player, price);
274                    player.sendMessage(
275                            TranslatableCaption.of("economy.removed_balance"),
276                            TagResolver.resolver("money", Tag.inserting(Component.text(this.econHandler.format(price))))
277                    );
278                }
279                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("merge.success_merge"));
280                eventDispatcher.callPostMerge(player, plot);
281            };
282            if (!force && hasConfirmation(player)) {
283                CmdConfirm.addPending(accepter, MINI_MESSAGE.serialize(MINI_MESSAGE
284                                .deserialize(
285                                        TranslatableCaption.of("merge.merge_request_confirm").getComponent(player),
286                                        TagResolver.builder()
287                                                .tag("player", Tag.inserting(Component.text(player.getName())))
288                                                .tag(
289                                                        "location",
290                                                        Tag.inserting(Component.text(plot.getWorldName() + " " + plot.getId()))
291                                                )
292                                                .build()
293                                )),
294                        run
295                );
296            } else {
297                run.run();
298            }
299        }
300        if (force || !isOnline) {
301            if (force || Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_COMMAND_MERGE_OTHER_OFFLINE)) {
302                if (plot.getPlotModificationManager().autoMerge(direction, maxSize - size, uuids.iterator().next(), player, terrain)) {
303                    if (this.econHandler.isEnabled(plotArea) && price > 0d) {
304                        if (!force && this.econHandler.getMoney(player) < price) {
305                            player.sendMessage(
306                                    TranslatableCaption.of("economy.cannot_afford_merge"),
307                                    TagResolver.resolver("money", Tag.inserting(Component.text(this.econHandler.format(price))))
308                            );
309                            return false;
310                        }
311                        this.econHandler.withdrawMoney(player, price);
312                        player.sendMessage(
313                                TranslatableCaption.of("economy.removed_balance"),
314                                TagResolver.resolver("money", Tag.inserting(Component.text(this.econHandler.format(price))))
315                        );
316                    }
317                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("merge.success_merge"));
318                    eventDispatcher.callPostMerge(player, plot);
319                    return true;
320                }
321            }
322            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("merge.no_available_automerge"));
323            return false;
324        }
325        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("merge.merge_requested"));
326        return true;
327    }
328
329}
